729552f-a.text:
1020 Rossville Avenue, west side, at the head of Pond Street, showing an old house on the Margaret McKeon property.
April 30, 1929
P. L. Sperr
729552f-a.folder: Rossville Avenue & Pond Street, Staten Island, NY

729558f-b.text:
(1)
Rossville Avenue, west side, between Pond and Grovcr Strcets (on the line of West Shore Parkway), showing the Margaret McKeon residence ano property. The house is situated about 350 feet back of the avenue.
April 30, 1929
P. L. Sperr
(2)
The sameyeight years later, seen from Barry Street,
near St. Josephs Cemetry.
May 5, 1V37
P. L. Sperr
